To use American Honda's Internet services

To use American Honda's Internet services, such as the Dealer Locator and brochure requests, we require a certain amount of personally identifying information such as name and address to meet your request.
We may gather and store certain anonymous information about your visit
We may gather and store certain anonymous information about your visit

We may gather and store certain anonymous information about your visit, including the name of your Internet Service Provider (ISP), the type of browser and operating systems used to access our site, the date and time you access our site, the website that referred you to us, and the pages you visit (click-through).

We may gather and store certain anonymous information about your visit, including the name of your Internet Service Provider (ISP), the type of browser and operating systems used to access our site, the date and time you access our site, the website that referred you to us, and the pages you visit (click-through).
Use of Cookies A "cookie" is a small text file or text identifier placed on your computer to assist us in providing customized services.
Use of Cookies A "cookie" is a small text file or text identifier placed on your computer to assist us in providing customized services.
Some of our sites, such as automobiles.honda.com and owners.honda.com/owners.acura.com, use web beacons also called single pixel gifs.

Certain gif files are provided by our ad management partner, DoubleClick. These files enable DoubleClick to recognize a unique cookie on your Web browser, which in turn enables us to learn which advertisements bring users to our website. The cookie was placed by us, or by another advertiser who works with DoubleClick.
In short, web beacons collect

Financing Tools, Apply online

If you choose to submit an application to Honda Financial Services for pre-approved credit, we will request that you provide personally identifiable information such as name, address, telephone number, social security number, date of birth, employment information, and gross monthly income.

We do not collect or share any of this information nor is this information personally identifiable.
In doing so, you may provide certain figures such as a trade-in value or an amount owed on your current vehicle to calculate an estimated payment.
If you choose to request that we mail you a specific model fact sheet or brochure or a full-line brochure, you will be required to provide us with your name and address.
If you choose to request that we mail you a specific model fact sheet or brochure or a full-line brochure, you will be required to provide us with your name and address.

You may decide that you wish to sign up to receive email newsletters on a particular Honda model and site features or to receive newsletters about all new models, special promotions, and site features. In doing so, we will request that you provide your name and email address.

When visiting our vehicle web pages, at times, you may choose to send electronic cards to your family or friends. To do so, you will have to provide your email address and the email address of the person you wish to send a card. This information is only used for the purpose for which it is received.

If you are not already a member, you may choose to enroll online in the Honda Rider's Club of America.
